text: 4.5: FG 10.42; 17.31; 1 Ko 15.51-52; Ze 5.9Mbe zumgum, mbe nduarira Fhe Bakɨme nɨma thivgip, mbe wo muuŋgi tɨvi, mbe nta bun ana suanga. Mba tɨvi ga nzuav nzuai guma, mbe suan zav mben rarga mbur ki. Ana ŋamki gumgi mbui tɨvi ga suaŋv mbe suanga, ana vhɨra vhɨzgi gumgi muuŋgi tɨvi ga suaŋv mbe suanga.
